name: Atmayoga
desciption: Atmayoga => A project in which we are giving a brief guidence for doing Yoga / Exercises / Meditation for alltypes of peaple having different age criteria. There is a special login and dashboard for each user and Admin. In this project we provide the yoga plans according to the need of person considering the age , physic and health of user .
Technologies: HTML5 , CSS3 , Bootstrap 5, Javascript, PHP , MySQL ,SQL, Xampp , Python , Machine learning.

name: Animal Safety
desciption: Animal Safety => This project is a website which helps us to understand and work on the problems of animals. Ex- Animal Shelter , Animal Foods , Animal Medications , Animal Adoptions , etc .
Technologies: HTML5 , CSS3 , Bootstrap 5, Javascript, PHP , MySQL , SQL , Xampp.

name: Vaishnavi's Portfolio
desciption: Portfolio => This is a ReactJs Project where I displayed everything about myself in the form of website and anyone who want to see my resume can simply go through this project .
